issue.title: [C++] Disable memory mapping by default in Arrow-C++
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16383](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16383). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In case there are places where Arrow-C++ is performing read or writes using memory mapping by default, we should make memory mapping optional
